title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: The user has downloaded Tomcat 7.0.0beta and started an instance with no webapps. When accessing a URL, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL in a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
1. Download Tomcat 7.0.0beta.
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps.
3. Access a URL in the Tomcat instance.
4. Confirm that it returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of an HTTP error 404.
